post.body: <HUGS> try hot lemon relief satchets with honey ~ works 2 alleviate somewhat, 4 me. and tons of hot-liquid anything - soup, water.
Star Lover - seems to me perfect holiday viewing except it's not completely out yet.
Kimchi - can also bottle your own. it's not hard, juz need right type of chilli powder n rock salt.did it b4, but 2 lazy 2 try again.
:) And I juz popped another Xmas CD in2 car that 4 some reason has 'My Favorite Things' fr Sound of Music. Lovg the nostalgia!
there's this little shop d/town, on Seymour St, near the Gastown tube station. nice spicy rice cakes - dukkbolgi.
Maury Povich? Yup agree he is esp these dys. Eons ago he did some non-talk show (late night). To think he was Connie Chung's Ex.
is Santacon unique 2 Texas? it's also Thanksgivg wkend ur end eh? Ack, moi believes in destiny, n what is meant 2/not 2 be. So be it.
first snowfall of the yr and freezing temperatures today. last night was serious major rain. bizarre weather!
tree looks ok outside, stickg out of that big metal pot. like it was just growing there. (hmm, shld we just leave it outside? ^ ^).
bought tree Fri, against my better judgemt (and yet again 4 another yr). still outside on deck. no time nor energy 2 decorate.
actually ahead this yr. done annual horse carriage ride alrdy, despite uncooperatg weather. D ~ free fun rides every Sat @ W41.
zonked. tis the season of concerts,recitals, parties n one 2 many unnec invite- expectatns. + mad rushes, harried drivers, poor visibility
Drove back home 4 bag left by front door, arrived 1 hr later at #1's sch. She has now missed h/w + markg time. I am such an awful mom :(
Dropped off kid #1 in sch this am. Where's your bag?!? Lordy I left her roller backpack by the door! Drove another 30 mins to drop off #2.
WOW - it's twilight zone these days fr am-pm. Darkness was 4.15pm yesterdy. doesn't help my forgetfulness being perpectual half-awake mode.
find rice cakes hard 2 handle. there's a Chnese versn at NewYr. hard 2 get rt texture. fryg it wrong melts it in2 a mess, instd of crisp.
they serve hard boiled egg with it 2. like that touch. NOT every place serves it with egg. love their eomuk guk (fish cake sticks in soup)
LOVE being home finlly. Warm, welcomg + cosy. Now 4 some consolatory ginger snaps + hot tea after traffic snarls. 2 top dinner n dessert ^ ^
Gawd, entire dy fr morning 2 night was traffic jams, v slow going n endless rain 2day. And jammed parking lots. Welcome Xmas season (+rain).
"Ephiphany" as Thunder wld say. You're talking abt the Santa CONvention??? Ahhh the dim lightbulb suddenly comes on.
After all that, trudged back in. 4get Boxg Day - it's NOT necc! Afterall it's NOT like deliverg pressies - urgent & I had 2 drive, rgdless.
30min shovellg sidewalks n paths 4 us & neighbors, another 15min scraping car clear, another 10 navigatg tracks out. Tractn control on 2!
TC & Thunder: hope u both are feelg somewhat better. Winng preventn 4 us this yr so far seems 2 be: warm H20 b4 bed, Omega 3 daily n fruit.
Warmest wishes 4 a cosy festive season all, rgdless of religious orientation! And an outstandg 2009 ahead! Here's 2 more ENJOYABLE Kdramas!
Holy Cow, I don't recall so much white stuff - continuously, and so much - here, in years. Suppsdly 1st coast 2 coast white Xmas since 1971!
tried startg tiny blanket-pillow drive 2day. I collect n drop off. no one emailed is really interested. all busy - Xmas prep or ski plans.
TC - warm or hot water - most natural remedy. not cold, nor room temp.
was so hassled myself over the wkend I forgot to take $10 in change, after paying $40 for something $30. v mad at myself 4 financial OUCH!
informed counter staff too. later, happened to see worried guy who went to customer service. v glad to have been secret santa!
tryg 2 help in meaningful little ways, in spirit of season. found bulging wallet = turned it 2 customer service, rather than counter staff.
TC, dependg on nature of cough, coconut juice can be too 'cooling' (Chinese yin-yang belief). ie PROLONGS cough. Ditto H2Omelon, oranges.
Or boil chicken with bones fr scratch. Add one clove chopped garlic. Boil least 2-3 hrs until marrow seeps thru. Add carrots, onions etc..
ANY soup. Even canned chicken soup will do. Add chopped garlic. Boil for at least 1/2 hr. Add healthy veggies. Carrots, celery = common fav,
I am thinkg to hell with some pple n expectations this yr.Takes beauty n joy out of gift givg. Imagine hearg my son's an L - hullo??
Took kids to Park's beautfiful Xmas train ride as usual. It was numbg within merely 0.5 hr of line ups. Imagine a long night out.
Street pple are refusg shelter bec they're not allowed 2 bring in their buggies n shoppg carts - to them, that's their whole entire world!
No one shld have 2 die in this way. Spendg Xmas donatg food n warm clothg. More meaningful than celebratg this yr. The cold spell = deadly.
Sad is homeless woman refusg 2 go in2 shelter despite -12 temps. Sat under her buggy with cardboard, kept warm fr candles n died ablaze..
TC, GET WELL soon! Meds don't work 4 me. Rely on soups (garlic!) n fluids 2 wait out. Also, cannot rest when sick - makes me feel more sick
sat in darkness watchg our blue LED lights on the window-sills instead, late at night. my idea of quiet zen amid frenzied seasonal insanity.
